Wide Frequency Range for Clear Communication

The YANTON T328 operates within a broad frequency range of 136-174 MHz and 400-480 MHz, ensuring crisp and uninterrupted communication. This range helps minimize interference and guarantees smooth conversations, making it an ideal walkie-talkie for both urban and remote environments.


High Channel Capacity for Versatility

With 199 available channels, the YANTON T328 allows users to efficiently manage communication within different teams or groups. Whether you are coordinating security, handling logistics, or organizing a large-scale event, this device ensures that you stay connected with the right people.


Extended Talk Range

The YANTON T328 offers an impressive talk range of up to 5KM, making it perfect for outdoor expeditions, emergency response teams, or large job sites. This long-range capability ensures seamless coordination, even in areas where mobile networks may be unreliable.

Equipped with a 1500mAh battery, this walkie-talkie provides extended hours of usage on a single charge. You won’t have to worry about losing connectivity during long shifts or outdoor excursions. The rechargeable battery ensures minimal downtime and maximum efficiency.


FM Radio Functionality

A standout feature of the YANTON T328 is its built-in FM radio (87-108 MHz), allowing users to listen to music, news, or emergency broadcasts. Whether you’re on break or need real-time updates, this feature adds convenience to your communication device.


Compact and Durable Design

Measuring 115x55x30mm and weighing 420g, the YANTON T328 is built for portability and durability. Its compact size allows for easy handling, while its rugged construction ensures it can withstand tough working conditions.

short_description: The MTX960 is smart for an organization because it offers extra features to expand your communication needs and enhance your operational efficiency. Building on the basic features of the MTX900, the MTX960 has the following additional features.
product_description:
The MTX960 is a smart choice for an organization because it offers extra features to expand your communication needs and enhance your operational efficiency. Building on the basic features of the MTX900, the MTX960 has the following additional features.


Audio Technology

As with any radio, sound quality is critical for effective communications. Motorola’s MTX900 and MTX960 Trunked system radio series can be heard in almost any environment because of LLE and noise-cancelling microphones.

Wideband and Programmable Channel Spacing (12.5/20/25 kHz)

The wideband technology and programmable channel spacing of 12.5/20/25 kHz offer flexibility & easy migration should channel spacing requirements expand.

Automatic Multiple Site Selection (AMSS)

The AMSS feature extends communications beyond the reach of a single trunked site. In a system where multiple trunking sites are used to extend coverage; the AMSS will automatically switch the radio to a different site when the current site signal becomes too weak. Thus ensuring the user's continuous radio communications.

Emergency Alarm*

An emergency function is provided to alert the dispatcher. This function is activated by pushing an easily accessible orange button on the top of the radio. These calls are processed by the trunking system with the highest priority to ensure that they get through as quickly as possible.

Selective Radio Inhibit

In situations when the radios have been stolen or are missing, the selective radio inhibit feature will enable the dispatcher to remotely disable the radios for greater security.

Talkgroup Scan

Provides effortless scanning combination of talkgroups and conventional channels for messages, and monitoring of channels in a multiple system environment.

Dual Mode Capability

Enables user the convenience of selecting either trunked or conventional operation providing maximum systems flexibility.

Failsoft Operation

In the event of a trunked system or central controller failure, radio conversation is still possible in fail soft mode. Upon indication of the central controller failure, the radio will automatically revert to a preassigned voice channel and operate in a non-trunked repeater mode.

Lithium Ion Battery Option

The Lithium Ion battery option provides high high-capacity battery at a lighter weight; allowing users to communicate for a longer period of time.


LCD Display

The 14-character alpha-numeric display contains useful icons and information; such as instant talk group ID, radio signal strength indicator and a battery gauge icon are value-added features to optimize communication efficiency.

90 Modes

Allows for up to 90 modes to keep large diverse user talkgroups constantly in touch with each other.

Intuitive Menus

Easy-to-use menus and an alpha-numeric phonebook/contact list make the radiosimple and easy to use.

Unlimited Private Call

In addition to receiving a one-to-one call, the MTX960 is also able to send one-to-one radio call through the pre-programmed list or via direct entry from the keypad.

Unlimited Call Alert

MTX960 will display the caller ID of the latest missed calls from the menu screen via a series of audible signals, ensuring that a page will be received. Users can also send their Call Alert page via a pre-programmed list or direct keypad entry.

Telephone Interconnect

  • Allows the user to receive and make telephone calls through the trunked system, thus expanding their communication coverage. In addition, dialing can also be via the user-editable phone book or direct keypad entry.

Baofeng radios, including models like the UV-82 and BF-888S, a programming cable is essential for connecting the radio to a computer. Here’s the detailed information about the Baofeng programming cable:

Baofeng Programming Cable Information

  • Cable Type: USB programming cable
  • Connector Type:
  • One end connects to a USB port on the computer.
  • The other end connects to the radio's programming port (usually a 2.5mm or 3.5mm audio jack, depending on the model).
  • Compatibility: Works with various Baofeng models, including UV-5R, UV-82, BF-888S, and others.
  • Driver Requirements: May require drivers for the USB-to-serial adapter to be installed on your computer (usually available online).
  • Software Compatibility: Compatible with programming software such as CHIRP, Baofeng programming software, or other third-party applications.
  • Length: Typically available in lengths ranging from 1.5 to 3 meters for convenience.
  • Functionality: Allows for programming of frequencies, settings, and other parameters directly from the computer for easier management.

Additional Tips

  • Check Compatibility: Ensure that the programming cable is compatible with your specific Baofeng model.
  • Download Software: Download the appropriate software for programming the radio before connecting the cable.
  • Use with Care: Handle the cable and connectors gently to avoid damage, and ensure connections are secure to avoid programming errors.

Using a programming cable can significantly simplify the process of setting up and managing your Baofeng radio’s configurations.

short_description: The Motocom MC-4 IP 4G Digital Walkie-Talkie is designed for long-range communication, featuring 3G, 4G, and WiFi capabilities. This versatile two-way radio supports group calls and private calls via a SIM card or WiFi, making it ideal for various applications, from outdoor adventures to professional settings.
product_description:
Key Features of the Motocom MC4 IP 4G


The Motocom MC4 IP 4G is built for those who demand seamless, long-range communication with a modern touch. Here’s what makes the MC4 IP 4G a standout choice.


Unlimited Talk Range with 4G Connectivity

Unlike traditional walkie-talkies with a limited range, the Motocom MC4 IP 4G is a walkie-talkie with mobile networks to offer unlimited communication. As long as you have network coverage, distance is no longer a barrier.


Durable and Compact Design

Best daily use walkie-talkie, the MC4 IP 4G features a high-quality, rugged construction while maintaining a compact and lightweight profile. Measuring just 100 x 57 x 35 mm and weighing 317g, it is easy to carry and use in any environment.


Integrated GPS for Real-Time Tracking

With built-in GPS functionality, this device is ideal for businesses that require location tracking. Whether you’re managing a fleet or coordinating security teams, the GPS feature ensures precise monitoring and navigation.


Long-Lasting Battery for Extended Use

Equipped with a 4400mAh battery, the MC4 IP 4G offers extended operation time, reducing the need for frequent recharging. This is crucial for long shifts, outdoor operations, and emergency situations.


Bluetooth and Hands-Free Communication

Supporting Bluetooth connectivity, the MC4 IP 4G allows for hands-free communication. This is particularly useful for professionals who need to stay mobile without constantly holding the device.


Android-Based Operating System for Versatile Functionality

Running on Android 4.1, this device supports app integration, allowing users to customize and enhance their communication experience. Whether you need additional features or prefer a specific interface, the Android system makes it possib


Multiple Call Modes and Voice Recording

The MC4 IP 4G supports both 1/2 call and 2/2 call modes, making communication more flexible for different situations. Additionally, it offers voice recording capabilities, ensuring that important conversations are never lost.


What’s in the Box?

When you purchase the Motocom MC4 IP 4G, you receive everything needed for a seamless experience. The package includes:

  • 1 x Motocom MC4 IP 4G Walkie-Talkie
  • 1 x 4400mAh Battery Pack
  • 1 x Antenna
  • 1 x Belt Clip
  • 1 x Hand Strap
  • 1 x Adapter
  • 1 x Charger
  • 1 x Programming Cable (optional)
  • 1 x User Manual


How to Use the Motocom MC4 IP 4G

Getting started with the MC4 IP 4G is simple. Charge the battery fully before use, attach the antenna securely, and power on the device. Insert a SIM card for cellular connectivity and select your preferred channel.

Use the push-to-talk (PTT) button to communicate instantly, and take advantage of the Bluetooth and hands-free features for added convenience. For tracking purposes, enable GPS and access location data through compatible applications.


Why Choose the Motocom MC4 IP 4G?

This device is designed for professionals who need reliable, long-range communication with modern features. Unlike traditional walkie-talkies, it eliminates range limitations by utilizing mobile networks.

With a sturdy build, extended battery life, GPS tracking, and Bluetooth support, it outperforms conventional options in the market.


Popular Applications of the Motocom MC4 IP 4G

If you’re in an industry that demands effective communication, the MC4 IP 4G is a valuable asset. Here’s how different sectors benefit from this advanced two-way radio:

Security and Law Enforcement

Security teams and law enforcement agencies rely on instant communication. With unlimited range and GPS tracking, the MC4 IP 4G ensures smooth coordination during operations.

Logistics and Transportation

Fleet managers and drivers can maintain real-time contact, improving efficiency and safety while monitoring location and routes.

Event Management

For large-scale events, instant and clear communication is vital. The hands-free and Bluetooth features make it easier to coordinate teams seamlessly.

Construction and Industrial Sites

Workers in large or remote job sites need uninterrupted communication. The MC4 IP 4G provides a reliable solution without signal range limitations.

Outdoor Adventures and Expeditions

Hikers, campers, and travelers exploring remote areas can stay connected as long as mobile networks are available.

  • Expert customer support for technical guidance and troubleshooting.
  • Secure transactions and fast shipping.

Have questions or need assistance? Our team is here to help! Contact us today for expert advice and purchasing support.

Security teams and law enforcement officers rely on it for instant and secure communication. In urgent situations, every second counts.

product_description:
Key Features of the Aircom AC 245 Plus SBR Walkie-Talkie


The Aircom AC 245 Plus SBR is a reliable and easy-to-use walkie-talkie. Let’s explore what makes it a great choice.

Durable Build for Tough Conditions

This walkie-talkie is built to last. It handles rough use, making it perfect for outdoor trips, construction sites, and security work.

Wide Communication Range

With a range of up to 5 km, you can stay connected even in remote areas. It ensures clear communication over long distances.

Long Battery Life

A powerful rechargeable battery provides up to 12 hours of use. This means fewer interruptions and longer operating time.

Clear Audio Quality

Noise reduction technology blocks background noise. Even in loud places, you can hear every message clearly.

16 Pre-Programmed Channels

With 16 channels, switching frequencies is quick and easy. This helps avoid interference and ensures smooth communication.

License-Free Operation

This device works on the UHF 400-470MHz band. No special license or permit is needed to use it.

Compact and Lightweight Design

The small and lightweight body makes it easy to carry. Its design is comfortable to hold, even for long hours.

VOX Hands-Free Operation

The VOX feature lets you talk without pressing buttons. This is helpful when you need to keep your hands free.

Emergency Alarm Function

In emergencies, the built-in alarm sends a distress signal. This feature improves safety in critical situations.

Integrated LED Flashlight

A built-in LED flashlight helps in dark or low-light areas. It’s useful for night shifts, camping, or emergency use.

Programmable for Custom Use

The device can be customized using software. Users can adjust frequencies and other settings to fit their needs.


What’s in the Box?

Each Aircom AC 245 Plus SBR package includes:

  • 1 x AC 245 Plus Walkie-Talkie
  • 1 x Charger
  • 1 x Antenna
  • 1 x User Manual


Popular Applications

This walkie-talkie is great for security, outdoor activities, event management, industrial work, and emergency teams. It helps teams stay connected in any situation.

Why Choose the Aircom AC 245 Plus SBR?

A tough-designed walkie-talkie with, long battery life, and clear audio. This walkie-talkie is a great choice for professionals and adventurers. It keeps communication smooth and reliable.


Get Yours Today!

Stay connected with the Aircom AC 245 Plus SBR. Whether for work or adventure, this device ensures clear and reliable communication. Order now and stay connected wherever you go!

Features:

  • Waterproof and Dustproof (IP67 Rating): The BAOFENG 9R PRO is designed to withstand harsh environments, offering full protection against dust and water, making it suitable for outdoor use, including in heavy rain or wet conditions.
  • Extended Range Communication: With its high power output and dual-band capability (VHF 136-174MHz and UHF 400-520MHz), the 9R PRO provides reliable long-distance communication, ideal for professional use, outdoor activities, and emergency situations.

short_description: The Kenwood NX-3220/3320 is a versatile, multi-protocol digital two-way radio designed for seamless communication in professional environments. With advanced NXDN and DMR digital protocols, excellent audio quality, and a rugged, weatherproof design, it’s built to deliver reliable performance in demanding conditions.
product_description:
The Kenwood NX-3220/3320 Walkie-Talkie is a premium two-way radio engineered for business and professional use. It combines the best of analog and digital technology, offering clear, secure communication in a variety of challenging environments. Below are the key features and benefits:

  • Multi-Protocol Digital Radio: Supports both NXDN and DMR digital protocols, making it compatible with different systems and enhancing flexibility in communication setups. It also works in conventional and trunked systems, offering broad compatibility.
  • Analog & Digital Mixed Mode: This radio operates in both analog and digital modes, allowing a smooth transition from legacy analog systems to newer digital networks without sacrificing connectivity.
  • Superior Audio Quality: The NX-3220/3320 is equipped with advanced noise reduction and audio processing, delivering crisp and clear sound, even in noisy environments like construction sites or crowded events.
  • Durable and Rugged Design: With IP54/55 and MIL-STD 810G certification, this walkie-talkie is resistant to dust, water, and impact, making it suitable for outdoor and industrial use where durability is essential.
  • Compact and Lightweight: Its ergonomic design ensures comfortable handling and portability for extended periods, reducing user fatigue, especially during long shifts.
  • Large LCD Display and Keypad: The NX-3220/3320 comes with a large, easy-to-read display and full keypad, allowing users to access key features, change channels, and customize settings effortlessly, even in low-light conditions.
  • 128-Bit Encryption: For enhanced security, this radio supports 128-bit encryption, ensuring that communication remains private and secure, particularly important for industries like security, law enforcement, and public safety.
  • Long Battery Life: Equipped with a high-capacity lithium-ion battery, it provides extended operational time, allowing users to stay connected for hours without the need for frequent recharging.
  • GPS & Bluetooth Capabilities: Integrated GPS tracking and Bluetooth technology enable advanced features like location services and hands-free communication, improving safety and convenience for users in the field.
  • Voice Announcements: The device supports voice announcements, providing audible confirmation of channel changes, feature activation, and more, helping users stay focused on the task at hand without having to look at the display.
  • Emergency Alert & Lone Worker Function: For added safety, it features an emergency alert button and lone worker monitoring, ensuring quick response during critical situations.

  • Clear Audio Quality: Equipped with high-quality audio components, the BFT1 ensures clear and crisp communication, even in noisy environments, allowing you to stay connected without interruptions.
